content: * get this pattern free on tlycblog com 1 * ***it s the granny stripe but in a whole new way *** the daphne afghan is sure to be your new favorite baby blanket pattern it s fast fun and easy this pattern is perfect for beginners looking to make their first crochet baby blanket the pattern includes a helpful assembly schematic and a step-by-step tutorial video **pattern highlights** // fall in love with the granny stitch all over again when you make the daphne afghan // this pattern includes a full tutorial video that takes you step-by-step through making the daphne afghan including picking yarns creating the blanket and adding the subtle border // choose worsted weight yarns from your stash or treat yourself to a gradient cake yarn like lion brand mandala **available sizes ** one size - 35 5 square adjust the size of triangles to make blankets larger or smaller **suggested yarn ** lion brand basic stitch premium & mandala ombre or any comparable worsted weight yarns **hooks used ** 5 5mm crochet hook **notions used ** -scissors -tapestry needle // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/daphne-afghan -a-free-crochet-granny-stripe-baby-blanket-pattern
